oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dennis Curtin interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Curtin, Dennis; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Dennis Curtin, USMC, served as an artillery forward observer and in a fire direction center. He served in-country February 1968 to February 1969.
